question: Against which team did Giroud shoot a goal?
query:
SELECT Distinct teamname FROM player as T1
 join match_fact as T2 on T1.player_id = T2.player_id
 join plays_match AS m on T2.match_team_id = m.match_team_id
 join national_opponent_team AS n on m.opponent_team_id = n.team_id
 WHERE T1.player_name ilike '%Giroud%' and goal = 'true'

question: All clubs where the name contains the word 'fc' and 'united'
query:
select club_name
 from club where club_name like '%FC%'
 and club_name like '%United%'

question: All coaches of the swiss national team
query: SELECT distinct T1.coach_name FROM coach AS T1 JOIN player_fact AS T3 ON T1.coach_id = T3.coach_id JOIN national_team AS T2 ON T3.team_id = T2.team_id WHERE T2.teamname = 'Switzerland'

question: all the coaches of germany

question: Average time for games' events in the world cup year 2018
query: SELECT AVG(T1.minute) FROM match_fact AS T1 JOIN national_team AS T2 ON T2.team_id = T1.team_id JOIN world_cup_result AS T3 ON T2.team_id = T3.team_id WHERE T2.year = '2018';

question: Coach of France when they won the World Cup?
query: SELECT DISTINCT T2.coach_name FROM national_team AS T1 JOIN player_fact AS T4 ON T1.team_id = T4.team_id JOIN coach AS T2 ON T4.coach_id = T2.coach_id JOIN world_cup_result AS T3 ON T1.team_id = T3.team_id WHERE T1.teamname = 'France' and T3.winner = 'true'

question: every player with the first name leo who played in the world cup in the year 1930

question: For which team does Paolo Maldini play?

question: For which team has Yobo played? Return the team name.
query:
select distinct nt.teamname from player as p
 join player_fact as pf
 on p.player_id = pf.player_id
 join national_team as nt
 on pf.team_id = nt.team_id
 where p.player_name ilike '%YOBO%';

question: Give me all matches where stage is final including the teamnames, the goals scored by the team and the year.
query:
SELECT m.year, nt.teamname, m.team_role, m.team_goals
 FROM plays_match AS m
 JOIN national_team as nt on m.team_id = nt.team_id
 where m.stage = 'Final';

question: Give me all teams names from the world cup 1994.

question: Give me all the national team names grouped by team and ordered by year from the latest to the earliest.

question: Give me the count of all penalties.
Give me the count of missed penalties.

question: Give me the country, year and attendance of the world cup with the biggest attendance
query: SELECT t1.country, t2.year, t2.attendance from stadium as t1 join plays_match as t13 on t1.stadium_id = t13.stadium_id join world_cup as t2 on t13.year = t2.year order by t2.attendance desc limit 1;

question: Give me the name of the player with the most substitutions in.
query:
select p.player_name, count(mf.substitution_in)
 from player as p
 join match_fact as mf on mf.player_id = p.player_id
 where mf.substitution_in = 'true'
 group by p.player_name order by count(mf.substitution_in) desc limit 1;

question: Give me the team names of the first four placed teams across all world cups.
query:
select t2.teamname, t1.winner, t1.runner_up, t1.third, t1.fourth from world_cup_result as t1
 join national_team as t2 on t2.team_id = t1.team_id
 where t1.winner = 'true' or t1.runner_up = 'true'
 or t1.third = 'true' or t1.fourth = 'true'

question: Give me the teamname of the winner of the world cup in 1954

question: How many Goals has Switzerland?

question: How many goals were shot for each shirt number?
query:
SELECT T3.year, T5.shirt_number, count(*)
 FROM player AS T1
 JOIN match_fact AS T2 ON T1.player_id = T2.player_id
 Join plays_match AS T3 ON T3.match_id = T2.match_id
 JOIN national_team AS T4 ON T4.team_id = T2.team_id
 JOIN player_fact as T5 ON T1.player_id = T5.player_id
 WHERE T2.goal = 'true'
 GROUP BY T3.year,T5.shirt_number
 ORDER BY T3.year DESC, count(*) DESC

question: How often did Germany play against England in the Allianz Arena?
query:
SELECT COUNT(*)
 FROM plays_match AS m
 JOIN national_team AS nt on m.team_id = nt.team_id
 JOIN national_opponent_team AS ot on m.opponent_team_id = ot.team_id
 JOIN stadium AS s on m.stadium_id = s.stadium_id
 WHERE nt.teamname ilike '%Germany%' AND ot.teamname ilike '%England%' AND s.stadium_name = 'Allianz Arena';

question: In what stadium did Harry Souttar play in in 1986
query:
SELECT DISTINCT T1.stadium_name
 FROM stadium AS T1
 JOIN plays_match AS T4 ON T1.stadium_id = T4.stadium_id
 JOIN match_fact AS T5 ON T4.match_team_id = T5.match_team_id
 JOIN player AS T2 ON T5.player_id = T2.player_id
 JOIN player_fact AS T6 ON T2.player_id = T6.player_id
 JOIN national_team AS T3 ON T6.team_id = T3.team_id
 WHERE T2.player_name = 'Harry Souttar' and T3.year = 1986

question: In what Stadium did Messi play?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT T1.STADIUM_NAME, T2.player_name
 FROM STADIUM AS T1
 JOIN plays_match AS T4 ON T1.STADIUM_ID = T4.STADIUM_ID
 JOIN MATCH_FACT AS T5 ON T4.MATCH_TEAM_ID = T5.MATCH_TEAM_ID
 JOIN PLAYER AS T2 ON T5.PLAYER_ID = T2.PLAYER_ID
 JOIN PLAYER_FACT AS T6 ON T2.PLAYER_ID = T6.PLAYER_ID
 JOIN NATIONAL_TEAM AS T3 ON T6.TEAM_ID = T3.TEAM_ID
 WHERE T2.PLAYER_NAME ilike '%MESSI%'

question: In which city were the most matches played during the 2014 world cup?

question: List the names of the players for Germany in the world cup 2022

question: List the top scorers of all matches between Italy and Germany.
query:
select nt.teamname, p.player_name, count(*)
 from player as p
 join player_fact as pf on p.player_id = pf.player_id
 join national_team as nt on pf.team_id = nt.team_id
 where pf.player_id in (
 select mf.player_id
 from plays_match as m
 join match_fact as mf on m.match_team_id = mf.match_team_id
 join national_team as n on n.team_id = m.team_id
 join national_opponent_team as ot on m.opponent_team_id = ot.team_id
 where mf.goal = 'true' and n.teamname = 'Italy' and ot.teamname = 'Germany' OR mf.goal = 'true' and n.teamname = 'Germany' and ot.teamname = 'Italy')
 GROUP BY nt.teamname, p.player_name
 ORDER BY count(*) DESC

question: Show the results of all matches from France in 2018
query:
select n.teamname, o.teamname, m.team_goals, m.opponent_team_goals
 from plays_match as m
 join national_team as n on m.team_id = n.team_id
 join national_opponent_team as o on m.opponent_team_id = o.team_id
 where n.teamname = 'France' and m.year = 2018

question: Show the results of Brazil against Germany
query: SELECT T1.teamname, T2.team_role, T2.year, T2.team_goals, T2.opponent_team_goals FROM national_team AS T1 JOIN plays_match AS T2 ON T1.team_id = T2.team_id JOIN national_opponent_team AS T3 ON T2.opponent_team_id = T3.team_id WHERE T1.teamname = 'Brazil' and T3.teamname = 'Germany'

question: Show the results of Brazil in 2018
query:
select T1.teamname, T2.team_goals,T3.teamname, T2.opponent_team_goals, t2.stage
 from national_team as T1
 join plays_match as T2 on T2.team_id = T1.team_id
 join national_team as T3 on T3.team_id = T2.opponent_team_id
 where T1.teamname like '%Brazil%' and T2.year = '2018'
 ORDER BY t2.year DESC , T2.round_id DESC

question: What are home team against England in 2002
query:
SELECT nt.teamname, m.team_role FROM national_team AS nt
 JOIN plays_match AS m ON nt.team_id = m.team_id
 JOIN national_opponent_team as ot on m.opponent_team_id = ot.team_id
 WHERE m.team_role = 'home' and ot.teamname = 'England' and nt.year = 2002;

question: What are the different clubs of the World Cup winners of 2018 and 2014?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT T1.club_name 
 FROM club AS T1 
 JOIN player_club_team AS T5 
 ON T1.club_id = T5.club_id 
 JOIN player AS T6 
 ON T5.player_id = T6.player_id 
 JOIN player_fact AS T7 
 ON T6.player_id = T7.player_id 
 JOIN national_team AS T2 
 ON T7.team_id = T2.team_id 
 JOIN world_cup_result AS T3 
 ON T2.team_id = T3.team_id 
 WHERE T3.year = 2014 
 AND T3.year BETWEEN T5.start_year AND T5.end_year
 AND T3.winner = 'true'
 UNION 
 SELECT DISTINCT T1.club_name 
 FROM club AS T1 
 JOIN player_club_team AS T5 
 ON T1.club_id = T5.club_id 
 JOIN player AS T6 
 ON T5.player_id = T6.player_id 
 JOIN player_fact AS T7 
 ON T6.player_id = T7.player_id 
 JOIN national_team AS T2 
 ON T7.team_id = T2.team_id 
 JOIN world_cup_result AS T3 
 ON T2.team_id = T3.team_id 
 WHERE T3.year = 2018 
 AND T3.year BETWEEN T5.start_year AND T5.end_year
 AND T3.winner = 'true'

question: What english player scored the most own goals
query:

 FROM player AS T1
 JOIN match_fact AS T2 ON T1.player_id = T2.player_id
 Join plays_match AS T3 ON T3.match_id = T2.match_id
 JOIN national_team AS T4 ON T4.team_id = T2.team_id
 WHERE T2.own_goal = 'true' and T4.teamname ilike '%England'
 GROUP BY T1.player_name,T3.year
 ORDER BY count(*) DESC

question: What player scored the most goals in the 2014 world cup?
query:
SELECT p.player_name, COUNT(DISTINCT mf.match_team_id)
 FROM match_fact AS mf
 JOIN plays_match AS m ON m.match_team_id = mf.match_team_id
 JOIN player AS p ON p.player_id = mf.player_id
 WHERE m.year = 2014
 AND mf.goal = 'true'
 GROUP BY p.player_name
 ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT mf.match_team_id) DESC
 LIMIT 1;

question: Who scored for the Switzerland national team in the world cup 2014?

question: When was the FC Barcelone invented
query:
SELECT found_year
 FROM club
 WHERE club_name like 'FC Barcelona'

question: Italy's coaches from 2000-2022
query:
SELECT distinct T1.coach_name
 FROM coach AS T1 
 JOIN player_fact AS T3 ON T1.coach_id = T3.coach_id 
 JOIN national_team AS T2 ON T3.team_id = T2.team_id 
 WHERE T2.year >= 2000 and T2.year <= 2022 AND T2.teamname = 'Italy'

question: Show the coach who have coached United Kingdom club
query:
SELECT distinct coach_name
 FROM coach as c
 JOIN coach_club_team as cc on c.coach_id = cc.coach_id
 JOIN club as cl on cc.club_id = cl.club_id
 WHERE club_name ilike '%United Kingdom club%'

question: Show me the player of Portugal?
query:
SELECT player_name 
 FROM player as p
 JOIN player_fact as pf on p.player_id = pf.player_id
 JOIN national_team as n on pf.team_id = n.team_id
 WHERE teamname = 'Portugal'

question: how many penalties in 2006?
query:

 FROM match_fact as T1
  JOIN world_cup_result as T2 on T1.team_id = T2.team_id
 WHERE T1.penalty = 'true' AND T2.year = 2006

question: Who has the highest count of missed penalty?
query: SELECT count( T1.missed_penalty), T2.player_name FROM match_fact AS T1 JOIN player AS T2 ON T1.player_id = T2.player_id WHERE T1.missed_penalty = 'true' GROUP BY T2.player_name ORDER BY count( T1.missed_penalty) DESC LIMIT 1

question: Penalties in 2018

question: Wich teams scored at least one goal in 2014
query:
SELECT T1.teamname, count(*)
 FROM national_team AS T1
  JOIN plays_match AS T2 on T1.team_id = T2.team_id
  JOIN match_fact AS T3 ON T2.match_team_id = T3.match_team_id
 WHERE T2.year = 2014 and T3.goal = 'true'
 GROUP BY T1.teamname
 HAVING count(*) >= 1

question: which game had zero goals in 2014
query:
SELECT t2.teamname, t3.teamname, t1.team_goals, t1.opponent_team_goals, T1.year
 FROM plays_match as t1
 JOIN national_team as t2 ON t1.team_id = t2.team_id
 JOIN national_opponent_team as t3 ON t1.opponent_team_id = t3.team_id
 WHERE t1.team_goals = 0 and t1.opponent_team_goals = 0 and t1.year = 2014 and T1.team_role = 'home'

question: Against who lost germany in wm 2014.
query:

 FROM national_team AS T1
  JOIN plays_match AS T2 ON T1.team_id = T2.team_id
  JOIN national_opponent_team AS T4 ON T2.opponent_team_id = T4.team_id
 WHERE T4.teamname = 'Germany' and T2.did_win = 'true' AND T4.year = 2014

question: How many goals did Switzerland have against serbian
query:

 FROM plays_match AS T1
  JOIN national_team AS T2 ON T1.team_id = T2.team_id
  JOIN national_opponent_team AS T3 ON T1.opponent_team_id = T3.team_id
 WHERE T2.teamname = 'Switzerland' and T3.teamname = 'Serbia'
